Här är vad andra har sagt om hotell:
No Positive  Renovation around the hotel sometimes can start at 08 30 am and woke you up There is nothing inside the minibar but they charge deposit of 150 euros for nothing in the room They dont have a luggage room instead they have lockers but for this they charge deposit of 10 from you 
 Large bed   Even allowing for the hotel being under major renovation works the quality of service leaves a lot to be desired Noise of running water coming from the heating system disturbed our sleep considerably No remediation possible Toiletries in bathroom had been used by previous guests Some were empty some partially used Checkout at 12 30 1hour after official checkout time was declined as priority is given to a tour group arriving earlier than normal checkin time Having paid over 300 for 1 night stay this is somewhat disappointing Service at breakfast was very poor Shabby state of hotel with the exception of the rooms is perhaps explained by the renovation works and work still to be done 
No Positive  Not given the room type we had booked and prepaid for No on site car park available despite pre booking of this Hotel was a building site so not very welcoming No privacy at all in bathroom as separated from lounge area by glass panel only Stairs to bed level steep and dangerous as no hand rail Arrived for our prepaid breakfast to be told we hadn t paid and had to show our payment receipt to prove we had

✅ **Fördelar:** The hotel is beautiful the pictures here arent doing it justice at all right on Oosterpark which is awesome The location is great walking distance to the tram public transport to anywhere and 5 10 mins to POI convenience shops and small local bars on the quieter part of the city You can also get to the city center by walking but it will take about 20 30mins Very clean room made and towels changed everyday Almost perfect
❌ **Nackdelar:** Its hard to get back to the hotel later at night since the tram is off after around midnight and walking 30mins after going out in the other end of the city can be tiring but we managed anyway This is not a big issue unless you really prefer to be in the center rather than in a beautiful quiet hotel as this one Not enough soap in the room restaurant bar snacks are very expensive Also I would ve appreciated being told that there is construction going on before the booking although this was again a non issue except for the small visual inconvenience in the entrance No noise or dirt at all

Can you recommend anny sight seeings in: Sure! Bulgaria has many beautiful sightseeing locations to visit. Some popular ones include the Alexander Nevsky Cathedral in Sofia, the Rila Monastery, the ancient city of Plovdiv with its Roman amphitheater, and the Black Sea coast with its stunning beaches and resorts like Sunny Beach and Golden Sands. Don't forget to also check out the picturesque town of Veliko Tarnovo and the stunning landscapes of the Pirin National Park. Enjoy your trip to Bulgaria!
I'm looking for a budget-friendly hotel: Sure! I recommend checking out hotel options in the Friedrichshain or Kreuzberg neighborhoods of Berlin. These areas are known for having a good selection of budget-friendly accommodations and are also well-connected to public transportation. Some popular budget-friendly hotels in this area include Motel One Berlin-Alexanderplatz, Meininger Hotel Berlin East Side Gallery, and A&O Berlin Friedrichshain. I suggest checking online travel websites for reviews and current availability. Enjoy your stay in Berlin!
Kan du rekommendera ett hotell i Paris s: System: Absolut! Ett bra alternativ för dig kan vara Hotel Lutetia Paris. Det är ett lyxigt och barnvänligt hotell med en fantastisk pool där både du och dina barn kan njuta av avkoppling och roliga stunder. Hotellet erbjuder också bekväma faciliteter för familjer och ett utmärkt läge i centrala Paris nära många sevärdheter. Jag tror att du kommer att gilla det!
